data.prayer: Father, let those from the 997 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kargil, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Kargil access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kargil, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 997 believers in Kargil to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, teach the 997 believers in Kargil that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kargil, Jammu and Kashmir, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kargil, Jammu and Kashmir, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 89,603 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

location.name: Kargil
location.people_groups_list: Bazigar (Muslim traditions), Rajput Chib, Shakhsaz, Arghun, Nat (Sikh traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bazigar (Muslim traditions) (7,300), Rajput Chib (600), Shakhsaz (2,700), Arghun (100), Nat (Sikh traditions) (1,900)
